content: Agreed on 4 main milestones. BobSmith will handle server security updates (Task 12).
Need to integrate a more stable external library for the core navigation logic.
Action Item: Research solar-capture efficiency improvements (Task 3). Check R&D budget status.
Adopted Agile/Scrum framework for new projects. Need to schedule a training for the team.
Decision made: Use LSTM models for short-term predictions; Transformer models for long-term (Task 5).
Increased sample size required for safety testing phase.
Optimization results are promising. Next step: prototype production (Task 7).
Migrate to PostgreSQL. Target completion Q4. Need a detailed backup plan.
Infrastructure upgrade schedule confirmed: weekends only to minimize disruption.
Prioritize multi-factor authentication implementation across all internal tools (Task 10).
Need to follow up with FrankWright on the design mockup review.
LauraAdams suggested a microservice architecture for the next phase.
Check regional regulatory requirements for energy storage solutions.
The new workflow includes daily standups and bi-weekly retrospectives.
NormanBates will lead the cloud security migration task (Task 16).
